mapper.sql: BRANCH_NO, BRANCH_NAME, SALES_ORG, SALES_CHA, BRANCH_GROUP, BRANCH_LEVEL, CONTACT,EMP_NO, TEL, MP, DEALER_NO, ADDRESS, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, WERKS, LGORT, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT
mapper.insert: insert into t_md_branch (BRANCH_NO, BRANCH_NAME, SALES_ORG, SALES_CHA, BRANCH_GROUP, BRANCH_LEVEL, CONTACT,EMP_NO, TEL, MP, DEALER_NO, ADDRESS, PROVINCE, CITY, COUNTY, WERKS, LGORT, CREATE_AT, CREATE_BY, CREATE_BY_TXT, LAST_MODIFIED, LAST_MODIFIED_BY, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT ) values (#{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{salesCha,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{branchLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{mp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{werks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lgort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update: update t_md_branch set BRANCH_NAME = #{branchName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SALES_CHA = #{salesCha,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCH_GROUP = #{branchGroup,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BRANCH_LEVEL = #{branchLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EMP_NO = #{empNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEL = #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MP = #{mp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEALER_NO = #{dealerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROVINCE = #{province,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CITY = #{city,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTY = #{county,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, WERKS = #{werks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LGORT = #{lgort,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_AT = #{createAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY_TXT = #{createByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MODIFIED = #{lastModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_MODIFIED_BY = #{lastModifiedBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAST_MODIFIED_BY_TXT = #{lastModifiedByTxt,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where BRANCH_NO = #{branchNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select
from t_md_branch where 1=1 and SALES_ORG=#{salesOrg} AND ( BRANCH_NO LIKE '%${branchNo}%' OR BRANCH_NAME like '%${branchName}%' )

select
from t_md_branch where SALES_ORG = #{salesOrg,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and BRANCH_GROUP= '01'
